message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DS, cs.DB, cs.AI, cs.LG 

This paper discusses the use of data analytics techniques to detect ransomware related transactions and malicious Bitcoin addresses. This topic falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) and data science (cs.DS), as it involves analyzing large amounts of data to identify patterns and anomalies. The use of topological data analysis also suggests a potential connection to database systems (cs.DB). Additionally, the proposed framework involves machine learning techniques (cs.AI) and statistical analysis (cs.LG) to improve the accuracy of ransomware detection.
